name: BLOODY いまどきのバンパイア
summary: Bloody Bride in essence is a dating simulation. You play as a young vampire who has reached (vampire) adulthood. He is sent to earth to suck the blood of a girl with a 'platinum aura'. However the girl has to willingly allow him to suck her blood. The character is given three years to complete his mission.
